data.persona: I am a merchant traveling with a group of mercenaries and other merchants for protection. We are traveling to the East to trade spices. I am very nervous about being ambushed by bandits.
data.description:
You are in the Ferry Terminal.
A huge terminal with a lot of traffic. The Ferry Terminal has a warm and positive vibe that welcomes all travelers across the land. It has an open space with a lot of illumination during the night.
The child and the captain are here.

You are carrying a spice and an sleeping bag, and wielding a blade.

data.short_motivation: I need to give this spice to the captain who purchased it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to sell most of my goods so that when I leave to travel to the East, bandits will not target my caravan because it is small.
data.long_motivation: I need to finish my journey and return home rich so that I can repay the sultan back home for his help with starting my business and buy myself a lovely plot of land.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get bags of exotic spices from caravan

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put bags of exotic spices in display rack

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give bag of spices to child
